name: Cloak and Dagger Subterfuge
description: Your increased martial skill allows you to take advantage of distracted foes to easily impose conditions, and even steal items without being noticed.
prerequisites: Int 13, Cloak and Dagger Style, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon, base attack bonus +11
benefit: While you are using Cloak and Dagger Style and wielding your chosen weapon, whenever you make an attack of opportunity against a target, you can attempt a free dirty trick<sup>APG</sup> combat maneuver check against the target as a free action as well. Additionally, whenever you successfully perform a dirty trick maneuver against a target, you can immediately attempt a steal<sup>APG</sup> combat maneuver check against the target as a free action. If you succeed, the target is unaware you have stolen an item.
